title: Sources: Cavs trade Hunter for Schroder, Ellis
content: The Cavaliers are trading De'Andre Hunter to the Kings for Dennis Schroder and Keon Ellis, sources told ESPN.

title: Sources: Kansas City hires ex-Terps HC Turgeon
content: Kansas City is hiring former Maryland coach Mark Turgeon as the program's next head coach, sources told ESPN.

content: With the opening ceremony of the Milan Cortina Winter Games set for Friday, IOC president Kirsty Coventry said American storylines of ICE and the Epstein files have been "sad" distractions.

title: Reed denied back-to-back wins in Bahrain playoff
content: Patrick Reed's bid for back-to-back titles on the European tour came up just short when he was beaten in a playoff won by Freddy Schott for his first title.

title: Sources: Trail Blazers acquire Krejci from Hawks
content: The Hawks are trading guard Vit Krejci to the Trail Blazers for Duop Reath and two future second-round picks, sources told ESPN on Sunday.

title: ESPN closes deal for NFL Network, RedZone rights
content: ESPN's purchase of NFL Network and other league digital assets has been finalized after government regulators approved the transaction.

content: Shakur Stevenson dominated Teofimo Lopez Jr. and looked unbeatable. But he's still looking for bigger challenges.

content: In danger of falling out of the field, USC got its most important win of the season Thursday. Mississippi State also got a big one.

content: With Giannis Antetokounmpo rumored to be in his final days with Milwaukee, Andre Snellings takes a look at the possible destinations and which would be best and worst for his fantasy value.

title: National Fibre scheme to integrate various schemes for natural and man-made fibres under Textiles Ministry
content: ‚ÄòWe are aiming to double the country‚Äôs textile value chain from the existing $170 billion to $350 billion by 2030,‚Äô P. Sivakumar says

content: Members of Legislative Assembly (MLA) from both Kuki-Zo and Meitei communities were headed to New Delhi to attend the meeting

title: State Highways Dept. commences work on bridge across Palar river
content: The ‚Çπ17.65-crore high-level bridge across Viruthasiri river is expected to benefit residents of at least 28 surrounding villages

title: Budget 2026 moots several proposals to rejuvenate indigenous shipping
content: In today‚Äôs speech, the Finance Minister spoke about the government‚Äôs aim to develop inland and coastal shipping so that its share in total cargo carried through road, rail and water increases from 6% to 12%

title: Budget 2026: Marginal hike in allocations for Social Justice Dept., Tribal Affairs Ministry
content: The Social Justice Department‚Äôs allocation for 2026-27 is ‚Çπ13,687.59 crore and the Tribal Affairs Ministry has been allocated ‚Çπ15,421.97 crore; the allocations have increased by 16.69% and 42.47% respectively compared with their respective Revised Estimates for the current fiscal

title: Two men who opposed harassment of Muslim shopkeeper booked in Uttarakhand
content: FIR lodged against members of right-wing groups who blocked a national highway to express anger over the intervention of Deepak Kumar and Vijay Rawat

title: Watch: Union Budget proposals spark political debate ahead of West Bengal polls
content: Infrastructure proposals in the Union Budget, including freight and industrial corridors and tourism projects, have triggered a political clash in West Bengal ahead of Assembly elections, with the BJP pitching development and the TMC calling the announcements political signalling.

title: Praful Patel denies Piyush Goyal‚Äôs claim that he has been appointed NCP chief
content: ‚ÄúCompletely baseless,‚Äù says Mr. Patel; Mr. Goyal later apologises; CM Devendra Fadnavis refutes Sharad Pawar‚Äôs claims of an NCP merger; DCM Sunetra Pawar reaches Baramati for Ajit Pawar‚Äôs last rites

title: Union Budget 2026: Agri Ministry allocation up 2.6%; farm outfits say FM ignored their demands
content: No hike for Kisan Samman Nidhi; agri research and education budget drops 4.8%; Food and PDS gets 10% hike; new multilingual AI tool, high-value cash crops get extra support; government did not fulfil promises to farmers, says BKS

title: Address ‚Äòlongstanding demands‚Äô of Baloch people, India tells Pakistan
content: The remarks from the official spokesperson of the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) came after Pakistan‚Äôs Interior Minister Mohsin Raza Naqvi alleged that the latest attacks were carried out with help from India

title: Trade bodies say Budget powers MSMEs, provides boost to domestic manufacturing and further simplifies doing business
content: A growth-oriented and sector-enabling Budget for micro and small scale industries that balances capital infusion, infrastructure expansion and proposes¬†cluster modernisation, and policy reform to support global competitiveness and sustainable employment generation in the MSE sector

title: CM remembers Sri Siddaramanand Puri Swami for his spirituality, secularism
content: He was addressing a gathering at a tribute function got up for the late swamiji at Tinthini Bridge in Deodurg taluk of Raichur district

title: Files expose alleged links between Epstein, Anil Ambani and Delhi ‚Äòleadership‚Äô
content: Anil Ambani appears to have met with Epstein on May 23, 2019, following which Epstein messaged Steve Bannon that he had met Prime Minister Modi‚Äôs ‚Äúguy‚Äù

title: A budget for difficult times
content: Union Budget sets Centre‚Äôs capital expenditure target at ‚Çπ12.2 lakh crore; India must stay deeply integrated with global markets, attracting stable long-term investment, says Finance Minister

title: Union Budget 2026 does little to reduce out-of-pocket expenses, medical inflation: experts
content: While exempting 17 cancer medicines from basic customs duty was welcome, there is little evidence to suggest that companies passed on the benefit to the customers in earlier instances

title: Karnataka is set to lose about ‚Çπ10,000 crore to ‚Çπ15,000 crore due to 16th FC‚Äôs recommendation, says Siddaramaiah
content: ‚ÄúWhen Karnataka‚Äôs share in the divisible pool of central taxes fell from 4.71% under the 14th Finance Commission to 3.64% under the 15th Finance Commission, the estimated loss was over 23% in revenue,‚Äù he pointed out.

title: Budget draws mixed reactions from common people
content: While some say Budget aligns with long-term vision of Viksit Bharat 2047, some express concerns about implementation of proposed initiatives and highlight unaddressed gaps in scholarships, education loans, teacher upskilling and campus-level mental health support

title: BRS cadre stage protests across Telangana against SIT examination of KCR
content: Police prevent different forms of protests at various places; Party ranks scuffle with police at Telangana Bhavan

title: Budget 2026: Govt. plans employment boost through tourism sector with upskilling of guides, Buddhist circuit in Northeast
content: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman also said that a National Destination Digital Knowledge Grid to digitally document all places of cultural, spiritual and historic significance would be set up

title: Tadoba‚Äôs tiger swims two rivers, kills three cattle in A.P.
content: The Male tiger had moved via the Polavaram Irrigation project before swimming the river Godavari to enter into human habitations in search of prey.

title: Industry forums in Kerala welcome development proposals in Union Budget
content: The FICCI and the Indian Chamber of Commerce & Industry, Cochin, praised initiatives aimed at bolstering manufacturing, with significant funding for bio-pharma and electronic components.

title: Union Budget 2026: Jammu and Kashmir fund allocation ‚Äòmarginally‚Äô up; Ladakh sees around 27% increase
content: ‚ÄúThe modest increase of ‚Çπ2,000 crore in Central allocations falls far short of addressing the region‚Äôs long-standing developmental gap or providing the stimulus required for revival of existing industrial units,‚Äù says FCIK

title: YSRCP leader Ambati Rambabu held for 19 hours in police custody
content: The Guntur police detained the former Minister from Saturday night till Sunday evening in connection with alleged derogatory remarks against Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu and disruption of police duties

title: SSLC examinations to be held from March 5 to 30; results on May 8
content: The SSLC IT examinations will be held from February 2 to 13, while model examinations are scheduled from February 16 and 20

title: Union Budget disappointing: K.N. Balagopal
content: On picking Kerala for the ‚ÄòRare Earth Corridor‚Äô scheme, Mr. Balagopal said that the State‚Äôs aim was to have related industries established in Kerala.

title: Jagan condemns attacks on YSRCP leaders, alleges collapse of law and order in Andhra Pradesh
content: YSR Congress Party chief speaks to injured leaders, accuses TDP government of vindictive politics and police misuse as tension erupts after attacks on party leaders‚Äô residences

title: Budget proposes high-speed rail links to Bengaluru; rail activists flag lack of clarity
content: The announcement has been welcomed by rail activists and urban mobility experts, though they remain cautious about the timeline and execution of the ambitious proposal.

title: Delay in sanction for new tank at  Thammanam likely to worsen water crisis in Kochi
content: The Kerala Water Authority had earlier submitted the design for a new 35-lakh-litre tank at Thammanam to address the shortage, but, according to sources, the proposal is still awaiting administrative sanction

title: Left, Congress leaders slam Union Budget for ignoring Kerala
content: M.A. Baby says Union Budget¬†exposes blind commitment of Modi government to a few big corporate houses; M.V. Govindan calls it ‚Äúa declaration of war‚Äù against Kerala; Chennithala terms Budget a ‚Äúcomplete disappointment‚Äù

title: Suspected TDP activists attack Jogi Ramesh‚Äôs house in Ibrahimpatnam
content: Agitators allegedly set fire to furniture and damage property after accusing the YSR Congress Party leader Jogi Ramesh of making objectionable remarks against Naidu and Nara Lokesh

title: Union Budget 2026: Despite sharp dip in actual spends, Jal Jeevan mission retains allocation at ‚Çπ67,600 crore
content: Although the allocation last year was significant, the Jal Shakti Ministry, according to the Union Budget documents, expects to spend only about ‚Çπ17,000 crore when this financial year ends

title: Free health tests for 72 lakh under Sanjeevani digital drive: Naidu
content: Chief Minister says the initiative marks a shift towards technology-enabled public healthcare, with AI-based advisories, regular screening and specialist consultations to address lifestyle diseases across Andhra Pradesh

title: Telangana government to tread cautiously in planning 2026-27 budget
content: Uncertainty over Central assistance for major infra projects forces the State to explore alternatives

title: Govt. to resume soon SLBC tunnel work aided by heli-borne AEM survey report: Uttam Reddy
content: Irrigation Minister says the report provided valuable geological data to aid assessing required tunnel support systems, in identifying any potentially adverse geological zones in advance

title: Union Budget 2026 emphasises the imperative of sustained growth as a key kartavya
content: Manufacturing remains central to India‚Äôs growth strategy given its role in large-scale employment generation, export competitiveness, supply chain resilience and Atmanirbharta

title: Union Budget 2026: Accelerating the ‚ÄòReform Express‚Äô in defence and national security
content: It is laudable that the Budget has given a boost to India‚Äôs defence funding, but the design and efficacy of follow-up reforms will be critical for cost-effective and precise delivery

title: Rupee fastest falling Asian currency, faith of investors shaken: Cong's Amitabh Dubey
content: ‚ÄúThe rupee is falling. It has been the fastest-falling Asian currency in the past year, and there's a combination of reasons behind it,‚Äù says Congress leader Amitabh Dubey

title: Industry bodies welcome growth-oriented Budget announcements
content: The proposals accelerate economic momentum and provides a strong push to infrastructure development, they say

title: Naidu clarifies ghee scam remarks, stresses Tirumala sanctity
content: Chief Minister says his statements were based on the NDDB report and the ongoing SIT probe is examining alleged irregularities in the TTD during the previous YSR Congress Party regime

title: Union Budget: hike in divisible tax pool share to 2.38% brings relief to Kerala
content: However, 16th panel, headed by Arvind Panagariya, has decided not to recommend any revenue deficit grants to States

title: People-centric Budget with focus on MSMEs, infra, says Pawan Kalyan
content: Emphasis on employment generation, innovation, city economic regions and high-speed rail corridors will reshape growth across regions and sectors, says Dy CM

title: Kuppam model becomes Andhra Pradesh blueprint, says Chandrababu Naidu
content: Chief Minister says development and welfare initiatives first piloted in Kuppam are now being replicated across the State, citing TDP‚Äôs four-decade resilience and post-election mandate

title: Kerala for All conclave: A different viewpoint on travel
content: Tiffany Brar, a visually challenged person, mentions the challenges she faces while travelling in the country and the way technology can be used to improve the experience

title: Union Budget is stable and balanced, says KKCCI
content: Though the Budget maintains fiscal discipline and policy continuity, Kalyana Karnataka needs targeted support to grow faster, according to the Chamber of Commerce and Industry

title: Budget gives strategic push to manufacturing sector
content: Budget signals shift to high-value, tech-intensive, low-carbon manufacturing and exports; for labour-intensive sectors, there is a focus on the entire value chain, along with access to capital for MSMEs

title: Union Budget: Turtle trails to be developed along Karnataka coast
content: Sitharaman‚Äôs nineth budget speech promised a world-class development of turtle trail along coastal areas of Odisha, Karnataka, and Kerala

title: Why Nifty50, BSE Sensex crashed after Budget 2026 speech? Top reasons
content: Stock market crash after Budget 2026: Investors reacted negatively to a hike in Securities Transaction Tax (STT) on futures and options (F&O) trades announced by FM Sitharaman.

title: Defence, education, railways, income tax & more: 10 big announcements in Budget
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the Union Budget 2026-27, her ninth consecutive, with major announcements across defence, railways, income tax, and healthcare. Prime Minister Modi hailed it as "historic" and a "high flight toward Viksit Bharat." Key proposals include a significant defence allocation, seven high-speed rail corridors, a simplified Income Tax Act, and support for rare-earth mineral development.

title: ICC reacts to Pakistan‚Äôs decision of boycotting T20 World Cup match vs India
content: The ICC has raised serious concerns over Pakistan‚Äôs decision to boycott its February 15 T20 World Cup 2026 match against India, saying selective participation goes against the spirit of global tournaments. While awaiting official word from the PCB, the ICC stressed that fairness, integrity and equal competition are core to its events. It warned of long-term consequences, urged a resolution, and said the boycott could harm the global game and fans, including those in Pakistan.

title: Exclusive: Rashid Latif on Pakistan boycotting India match: ‚ÄòIn 24 hours, anything is possible'
content: Former Pakistan captain Rashid Latif believes Pakistan‚Äôs boycott of the India match at the T20 World Cup is a calculated move aimed squarely at the ICC‚Äôs financial and governance structure. Linking the decision to Bangladesh‚Äôs removal from the tournament, Latif argues this is not an emotional reaction but a strategic play that could reshape world cricket negotiations.

title: Oracle may layoff up to 30,000; & one of big reasons is company's 'commitment' to Sam Altman for ...
content: Oracle faces massive job cuts, potentially 20,000-30,000, to fund its costly $300 billion OpenAI partnership. The tech giant has already incurred significant debt for AI data centers, with its stock value plummeting. US banks are hesitant to finance Oracle's projects, forcing the company to seek upfront customer payments and consider selling its Cerner unit.

title: New or Old? Which I-T regime should you choose for FY 2026-27? Tax rates, slabs explained
content: Union Budget 2026 maintains the existing income tax framework, with the new regime offering tax-free income up to Rs 12 lakh for individuals. While the old regime continues with its deductions, the new system has been progressively liberalized since 2020, making it increasingly attractive for middle-income taxpayers.

title: Gold, silver prices in free fall! 'Overspeeding leads to crash'
content: Over the last two sessions, silver has declined by a cumulative Rs 1,34,241, translating into a fall of 33.6%. On a weekly basis, the metal has dropped by nearly 21%, or Rs 69,047, from its level of Rs 3,34,699 per kg recorded on January 23.

title: Rohit Shetty asks industry friends not to visit after firing incident
content: Unidentified assailants fired four rounds outside director Rohit Shetty's Mumbai residence early Sunday. While no injuries were reported, security has been heightened, and five suspects have been detained in Pune. The film industry has expressed shock and concern, urging the Chief Minister to intervene.

title: Carlos Alcaraz finally does it, wins his maiden Australian Open title after outfoxing Djokovic
content: Carlos Alcaraz won his first Australian Open, defeating Novak Djokovic 2-6, 6-2, 6-3, 7-5 to deny him a record 25th Grand Slam. At 22, Alcaraz became the youngest man in the Open era to complete a career Grand Slam. After losing the first set, he dominated with pace and power, sealed his seventh major, and cemented his world number one status.

title: No sympathy for the Djoker: Alcaraz dispatches Djokovic with ease
content: Mick Jagger‚Äôs ode to Lucifer could very easily be retrofitted for Novak Djokovic, a figure for whom tennis fans have developed a begrudging sympathy over the years. But Carlos Alcaraz had no such sympathy. He had his own date with destiny.

title: 'He shared everything': Fadnavis rubbishes speculations over merger of NCP after Ajit Pawar's death
content: Maharashtra CM Devendra Fadnavis expressed surprise regarding any potential merger talks between NCP factions, stating Ajit Pawar always confided in him. This follows Sharad Pawar's claim that Ajit Pawar had set February 12 for a merger announcement. Ajit Pawar's wife, Sunetra Pawar, was recently sworn in as Deputy CM.

title: Union Budget 2026: Top 10 winners and losers
content: Union Budget 2026, hailed as a "highway of immense opportunities," focuses on economic growth, meeting aspirations, and equitable resource distribution. Key proposals include infrastructure development, tourism promotion, pharmaceutical sector investment, and measures to boost women entrepreneurship and the textile industry. However, markets reacted negatively to increased Securities Transaction Tax, impacting traders and promoters.

title: Union Budget 2026: No big-ticket announcements, but poll-bound states part of new initiatives
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's Union Budget 2026 incorporates poll-bound states into ambitious development initiatives like rare earth corridors and high-speed rail networks. While not offering state-specific bonanzas, the budget includes infrastructure, logistics, and tourism boosts for West Bengal, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Assam, and Puducherry.

title: New excise duty on tobacco products: Cigarette prices to increase up to Rs 55 per pack
content: Cigarette prices have surged by Rs 22-25 per pack of 10 following a new excise duty regime, the first tax hike in seven years. This move aligns India's tobacco taxation with global health standards. Premium cigarettes will see significant price increases, with distributors anticipating new MRPs from Monday. Concerns about smuggling and counterfeit products are rising.

title: 'Deeply shocked ': IFTDA condemns firing incident at Rohit Shetty's residence
content: The IFTFA, while expressed deep safety concerns, also sought personal intervention from Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis.

title: Imran Khan slams actors burdening a film with huge fees
content: Actor Imran Khan, making a comeback, critiques the system where actors' fees inflate film budgets. He argues stars should invest in their projects, taking responsibility for success rather than demanding exorbitant upfront salaries. Khan highlights his uncle Aamir Khan's approach of taking payment at the backend for further clarity on it...

title: Post Op Sindoor push: Defence budget jumps 15%; what‚Äôs in the pipeline for India‚Äôs military
content: The Union Budget 2026 allocates a record Rs 7.85 lakh crore for defence, a 15% increase, prioritizing military modernization. Key procurements include Rafale jets, six next-generation submarines under Project 75(I), and indigenous unmanned interceptor crafts, bolstering India's air, sea, and land capabilities.

title: Budget 2026: Central schools get funding boost; KVs see steady rise in allocations
content: Union Budget 2026‚Äì27 strengthens India‚Äôs central school systems with higher allocations for Kendriya and Navodaya Vidyalayas. Funding for KVS rises to ‚Çπ10,129.41 crore, while NVS receives ‚Çπ6,025 crore, signalling continued support for urban and rural learners. The increases, part of a wider school education budget expansion, focus on sustaining infrastructure, staffing, and residential facilities amid rising enrolment and operating costs.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: Fresh round of peace talks rescheduled; Zelenskyy announces new dates
content: Ukraine's President Zelenskyy announced a delay in crucial trilateral talks with Russia and the US, now set for February 4-5 in Abu Dhabi. This follows surprise US-Russia discussions in Florida, highlighting ongoing diplomatic efforts despite unresolved territorial disputes. Both sides remain committed to finding a peaceful resolution to the protracted conflict.

title: 'Blind to India‚Äôs real crises': How Rahul Gandhi, oppn leaders reacted to the Union Budget
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the Union Budget 2026-27, increasing capital expenditure to Rs 12.2 lakh crore. The Rs 53.5 lakh crore budget received mixed reactions, with the BJP hailing it as growth-oriented, while the Congress termed it "disappointing" and lacking specifics for common citizens.

title: STT hike after Budget 2026: What does it mean for F&O traders and investors
content: Starting April 1, 2026, India will see increased Securities Transaction Tax (STT) on futures and options trading. The Finance Minister announced higher rates for options premium, exercise, and futures, aiming to moderate speculative activity. This change, part of Budget 2026, will slightly raise trading costs for derivatives participants, while equity and mutual fund STT rates remain untouched.

title: Budget 2026: Rare earths & Orange Economy - key takeaways and what they mean
content: Union Budget 2026-27 prioritizes infrastructure growth and manufacturing, with a significant capital expenditure increase to ‚Çπ12.2 lakh crore. Fiscal deficit targets 4.3% of GDP. Key initiatives include a new Income Tax Act, the Biopharma Shakti scheme, and support for semiconductor and rare earth production, aiming to boost economic momentum and self-reliance.

title: 'High flight toward Viksit Bharat': PM Modi hails Union Budget 2026 as 'historic'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi hailed the Union Budget 2026 as "historic," charting a roadmap for a Viksit Bharat by 2047 and boosting India's reform journey. He also highlighted the "mother of all deals" with the EU, aimed at benefiting youth and MSMEs, and praised Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's record ninth consecutive budget presentation.

title: Border 2 Box Office day 10: Film crosses Rs 262cr; outpaces Mardaani 3
content: 'Border 2' continues its strong run in theaters, nearing Rs 262.45 crore after its third week. Despite expected weekday drops, the film saw a solid second weekend. Meanwhile, Rani Mukerji's 'Mardaani' opened to Rs 4 crore, showing promising growth on its second day, indicating audience interest.

title: Google cofounder makes biggest-ever public donation to tackle California housing crisis
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has made his largest public donation, contributing $20 million to a new coalition tackling California's housing crisis. This significant move, backed by other tech leaders, comes as the state's wealthy face a potential wealth tax. Brin's philanthropy has been substantial, with billions donated to various causes, including climate solutions and medical research.

title: Budget 2026: FM outlines NBFCs vision, targets credit and tech; PFC, REC to be restructured
content: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman unveiled the government's Viksit Bharat vision for Non-Banking Financial Companies, setting clear targets for credit expansion and technology adoption. Key public sector NBFCs like Power Finance Corporation and Rural Electrification Corporation will be restructured to boost efficiency. This initiative, alongside a banking sector review, aims to strengthen India's financial system for sustained reform-led growth.

title: What Budget 2026-27 means for Indian IT industry: 8 Biggest announcements
content: Union Budget 2026-27 unveils significant tech sector boosts, including a 20-year tax holiday for foreign cloud service providers operating from India. Key initiatives like India Semiconductor Mission 2.0 and increased outlay for Electronics Components Manufacturing Scheme aim to fortify domestic capabilities and attract global investment.

title: Budget 2026 income tax: Top announcements made by FM Sitharaman - check list
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman unveiled the Union Budget 2026. New rules simplify tax filing and reduce burdens. Key changes include extended deadlines for revised returns and staggered filing dates. Tax Collected at Source rates for education, medical purposes, and overseas tours are reduced. Small taxpayers get easier tax deductions. Awards from the Motor Accident Claims Tribunal are now tax-exempt.

title: Nvidia H-1B data reveals US pay as Jensen Huang reviews all compensation
content: Nvidia's soaring stock has created millionaires among its employees, with H-1B visa filings revealing substantial base salaries for critical roles. While CEO Jensen Huang emphasizes personal involvement in compensation, earlier hires have significantly benefited from equity appreciation. The data offers a glimpse into the pay for engineers, architects, researchers, and product managers, excluding bonuses and equity.

title: SHE gets a boost in Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget 2026
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced the 'SHE Marts' initiative to empower women entrepreneurs, building on the Lakhpati Didi scheme. These community-owned retail outlets will strengthen grassroots entrepreneurship by enabling women-led self-help groups to operate local retail networks, improving market access for their products and creating sustainable livelihoods.

title: Op Sindoor impact: Defence budget jumps to Rs 7.85 lakh cr, modernisation gets Rs 2.19 lakh cr
content: The Union Budget 2026 significantly boosts defence spending to Rs 7.85 lakh crore, a substantial rise from last year.  Modernisation efforts will receive Rs 2.19 lakh crore, with key allocations for aircraft and naval fleets.  Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman also announced customs duty exemptions on aircraft components and raw materials, aiming to invigorate the defence aerospace industry.

title: Handshake refused! India vs Pakistan U19 World Cup showdown opens with tense moment
content: India and Pakistan U-19 captains notably skipped the customary handshake at the toss for their crucial World Cup encounter. This follows a recent trend of no handshakes between the two nations' cricket teams amid ongoing political tensions. The match is a must-win for Pakistan to keep their semi-final hopes alive.

title: From arithmetic to architecture: What Budget 2026 really means
content: The most consequential decision is also the quietest. The Centre has accepted the Commission‚Äôs recommendation to retain 41% vertical devolution to states. In an era where political economy is increasingly centralised in rhetoric if not always in law, this is a signal worth underlining. It anchors federal trust even as the Centre tightens its own fiscal belt. The Budget‚Äôs fiscal deficit for 2026‚Äì27 is pegged at 4.3% of GDP, with a clear glide path towards a 50¬±1% debt-to-GDP ratio by 2030. This is not austerity. It is choreography.

title: "Markets Go Up And Down": PM's Economic Advisor Brushes Off Budget Day Crash
content: The market's negative reaction to budget is no indicator about the outcome of the budget, Sanjeev Sanyal Economic Advisor to Prime Minister Narendra Modi, told NDTV today in an exclusive interview.

title: Opinion: Opinion l The Many Shades Of Nirmala Sitharaman's Union Budget 2026
content: In the kaleidoscopic narrative of India's economic landscape, the release of Budget 2026 by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman marked a day likely to resonate for years to come.

title: Budget 2026 Highlights: "Push To Economy To Maintain Growth Momentum," Says N Sitharaman
content: Union Budget 2026 Highlights: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's ninth budget presentation was inspired by three 'kartavyas' or responsibilities.

title: Student Loses Vision After Alleged Assault By Peers In Lucknow School: Cops
content: A Class 5 student of Army Public School here was allegedly assaulted by two fellow students on the premises, resulting in serious eye injuries and loss of vision, police said on Sunday.

title: 18-Year-Old Student Stabbed To Death By 2 Classmates In UP: Cops
content: An 18-year-old student was stabbed to death allegedly by two of his classmates following a dispute in Uttar Pradesh's Shamli district on Sunday evening, police said.

title: TVK Turns 3: Vijay To Address Cadre Amid Two-Front Battle
content: Actor Vijay's political party, Tamizhaga Vetri Kazhagam (TVK), will mark its third anniversary on Monday, a milestone that comes at a politically charged moment, just three months ahead of the Tamil Nadu Assembly elections.

title: Karnataka Emerges Biggest Gainer Under 16th Finance Commission Formula
content: The Congress-ruled Karnataka is set to emerge as the biggest gainer of the 16th Finance Commission's horizontal devolution formula, while the BJP-led Madhya Pradesh will likely take the largest hit.

title: KCR Questioned By Probe Team At His Hyderabad Home In Phone Tapping Case
content: Former Chief Minister K Chandrasekhar Rao was on Sunday questioned by the Telangana Police SIT at his residence here in connection with a case related to alleged "phone tapping" during the previous BRS regime.

title: Ram Temple Construction To End By April 30; Estimated Cost Rs 1,900 Crore
content: All construction work related to the Ram temple in Ayodhya is expected to be completed by April 30, with the overall cost of the project estimated at around Rs 1,900 crore, Ram Temple Construction Committee chairman Nripendra Mishra said on Saturday.

title: 5 Linked To Lawrence Bishnoi Gang Detained In Rohit Shetty House Firing: Cops
content: Gunshots were fired at filmmaker Rohit Shetty's residence in Mumbai on Sunday, leading to the detention of five persons in Pune, with the preliminary probe pointing at their links with Lawrence Bishnoi gang member Shubham Lonkar.

title: 5-Year-Old Arrested By ICE Agents In Minnesota Released After Judge's Order
content: A 5-year-old boy and his father detained by immigration officers in Minnesota and held in Texas have been released following a judge's order. They have returned to Minnesota, according to the office of Texas Rep. Joaquin Castro.

title: 32-Year-Old Woman Shot Dead by Lover In Rishikesh: Cops
content: A 32-year-old woman was allegedly shot dead by her partner at her home in Uttarakhand's Rishikesh, police said on Sunday.

title: "Truly Sorry": Kolkata Restaurant Apologises For Serving Beef To YouTuber
content: Popular Park Street bar-cum-restaurant Olypub has issued a formal apology after unintentionally serving beef instead of goat meat to YouTuber Sayak Chakraborty, prompting him to withdraw his police complaint against the waiter involved.

title: Mamata Banerjee Approaches Supreme Court Against Poll Body's Bengal Roll Revision
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has taken her battle against the Election Commission's Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls to the highest court, filing a personal writ petition in the Supreme Court on Sunday.

title: Parts Of Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh Receive Fresh Snowfall, Rains
content: Parts of Kashmir and Himachal Pradesh received fresh snowfall and rains on Sunday, even as night temperatures rose across the northern states.

title: 28-Year-Old Woman Run Over By Train While Crossing Track In Jaipur: Cops
content: A 28-year-old woman was killed after she was run over by a train while crossing a railway track here on Sunday, police said.

title: Protester Erfan Soltani Gets Bail, Days After Iran Denied Death Row Claim
content: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani has been released on bail, as per reports, after the United States warned he was due to be executed though Tehran denied he had been sentenced to death.

title: Epstein Accuser Spent Night With Ex-Prince Andrew, Was Given Buckingham Palace Tour: New Claim
content: A second Jeffrey Epstein accuser has alleged the late US sex offender sent her to Britain for a sexual encounter with former prince Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, as per reports.

title: First Passenger Flight Lands At Sudan Airport Nearly 3 Years Into War
content: A commercial flight landed in the Sudanese capital Sunday for the second time since a devastating war broke out in the northeastern African country nearly three years ago.

title: 'Unusual': BNP Flags Voter Migration Ahead Of Bangladesh Polls
content: The BNP on Sunday alleged it found an "unusual" voter migration in capital Dhaka and other parts of Bangladesh ahead of the February 12 parliamentary elections.

title: Budget 2026 gives a boost to mental healthcare: North India to get its own NIMHANS
content:
NEW DELHI: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced the plans to set up a new unit for the National Institute for Mental Health and Neuro Sciences in North India. Acknowledging the lack of mental health institutions in the region, she also announced the national mental health institutes in Jharkhand's Ranchi and Assam's Tezpur shall also be upgraded. Addressing the gaps in the mental health infrastructure in India, Sitharaman introduced the upgrade, stating, "Reaffirming our commitment to mental health and trauma care, there are no national institutes for mental health care in North India."

Mental Health Takes Priority In Budget 2026, FM Sitharaman Announces NIMHANS 2 For North India

She further announced the government's plan to establish and upgrade mental health institutions in North India. She said, "We will therefore set up a NIMHANS 2.0 and also upgrade national mental health institutes in Ranchi and Tezpur as regional apex institutions."

title: Copy of Alcaraz wins Aussie Open, completes career Slam
content: Carlos Alcaraz defeats Novak Djokovic in the australian open final . alcaraz becomes the youngest man to complete a career grand Slam . the 24-time grand slam champion has never lost in his 10 previous finals . he beats a third-seed in a 512-hour epic semifinal .

title: LeBron's top Madison Square Garden moments
content: leBron James has played 33 games in the "World's Most Famous Arena" he averaged 27.8 points, 6.2 rebounds and 5.6 assists, and only scored less than 20 points once in that series . he became the first visiting player with multiple 30-point triple-doubles .

title: Super Bowl-bound Patriots follow in Mack Hollins' ...
